channel.title: sunset on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in sunset on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 1.19: Sunsets
item.description: 2nd June, 2011 Hello, This will be a short one. MATLAB week is going surprisingly well and I’m learning a lot without getting frustrated. Only tomorrow left and I find that it has been an easier one than most others.

item.title: LfE 24: Volcano Sunset
item.description: 20/04/2010 Hello, As you all probably know, the Iceland Volcano continues to erupt disrupting flights all over northern Europe. My flatmate who was supposed to go to Germany for part of her PhD has been grounded here.

item.title: Pon Maalai Pozhudu Lyrics and Translation
item.description: One of Ilayraja’s most popular pieces. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hymujdC0mlw **Pon maaalaip pozhuthu Idhu oru pon maalaip pozhudhu Vaanamagal naanugiraal vaeru udai poonugiraal (Idhu oru)** Golden evening time
